snippet: Stanley Cup finalists last season, the Devils have put their postseaason prospects in doubt with a four-game losing streak.
abstract: New Jersey Devils, 2012 Stanley Cup finalists, have put their postseason prospects in doubt with four-game losing streak.
lead_paragraph: Stanley Cup finalists last season, the Devils have put their postseaason prospects in doubt with a four-game losing streak.

headline.main: Devils’ Playoff Push Feels Like a Halfhearted Tap
headline.print_headline: Devils’ Playoff Push Feels Like a Halfhearted Tap
